canvases

Class GameCanvas

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.newdawn.slick.state.BasicGameState
      • com.erebos.engine.core.ECanvas
        • canvases.GameCanvas
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.newdawn.slick.ControlledInputReciever, org.newdawn.slick.ControllerListener, org.newdawn.slick.InputListener, org.newdawn.slick.KeyListener, org.newdawn.slick.MouseListener, org.newdawn.slick.state.GameState

    public class GameCanvas
extends com.erebos.engine.core.ECanvas
    Used to display and update the map and commands while playing the game.

      • createStartingUnit

        private void createStartingUnit(Territory t,
                      org.newdawn.slick.SpriteSheet ss,
                      boolean isArmy,
                      Player p)
        Creates a Unit at the beginning of the game. Sets the Territory as a home city for the Player.
        Parameters:
        t - the location of the Unit
        ss - the Spritesheet of this Unit
        isArmy - true, if the Unit is an army
        p - the the Player who owns the Unit

      • createUnit

        public void createUnit(Territory t,
              boolean isArmy,
              Player p)
        Creates a Unit.
        Parameters:
        t - the location of the Unit
        isArmy - true, if the Unit is an army
        p - the the Player who owns this Unit

      • SSFactory

        private org.newdawn.slick.SpriteSheet SSFactory(java.lang.String location,
                                      java.lang.Boolean isArmy)
        Used to generate a SpriteSheet of a territory. Assumes that your SpriteSheet has 8 sprites.
        Parameters:
        location - the file path of the SpriteSheet
        isArmy - true, if the Unit is an army
        Returns:
        the sprite sheet

      • submit

        public void submit()
        Submits all Orders to the current Phase. Will ask 'are you sure?' if a unit does not have an Order.

      • adjudicate

        public void adjudicate()
        Adjudicates all Orders for this Phase.

      • setState

        public void setState(int s)
        Sets the current state of this game.
        Parameters:
        s - the new state

      • updateTerritory

        public void updateTerritory(Territory t,
                   int mx,
                   int my)
        Updates a Territory depending on the state of the game. Only fires when a Territory is clicked on and if the current state deems updating a Territory is necessary.
        Parameters:
        t - the Territory to be updated
        mx - the x coordinate of the Mouse cursor to display the command GUI
        my - the y coordinate of the Mouse cursor to display the command GUI

      • finalizeOrder

        public void finalizeOrder()
        Sets the current Order for the Unit or if it is the Build Phase the Order is sent straight to the Phase.

      • discardOrder

        public void discardOrder()
        Sets the current Order value to null.

      • removeUnit

        unit - the Unit to be removed

        Gets the current Phase.

      • save

        public void save()
        Saves the game. Pretty static method right now. Only one save is allowed currently.

      • load

        public void load()
          throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Loads the game. Pretty static right now. The jar must be in the same directory as the BITPLOMACY_SAVES directory for it to work.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - the file not found exception
